title: Kat in ARAM
body: I know that not many people give a rat's ass about ARAM, but there are certain things about ARAM that just arent right. Katarina for instance, I have a major issue with no matter what champion I am. Face to keyboard is a win every time. Ban or nerf Katarina in ARAM please. Its just so unfair, it ruins the play experience. Does anyone else share my views?
